summary: The iPhone is a popular smartphone made by Apple. It was first introduced in 2007 by Steve Jobs and has since become one of the most successful mobile phones ever. iPhones use Apple's iOS software and are known for their innovative features like multi-touch screens and fingerprint sensors. Over the years, they have gotten bigger screens, better cameras, and water resistance. The iPhone's design has also changed, with newer models having less bezel and facial recognition instead of a home button. It has revolutionized the mobile phone industry and made smartphone apps very popular.
title: IPhone
